history.proof: hauto use: N.add_comm, N.le_0_l, N.add_le_mono_l, N.add_0_r.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : N The term "y + x" has type "N" while it is expected to have type "nat".

original: intros x y. apply (le_trans _ (N.add y x) _). - apply le_add_r. - rewrite <- N.add_comm. apply le_add_l.
